quote: And I know an eighteenth charm, and that charm is the greatest of all, and that charm I can tell no man, for a secret that no one knows but you is the most powerful secret there can ever be.
quote_letters: AND I KNOW AN EIGHTEENTH CHARM AND THAT CHARM IS THE GREATEST OF ALL AND THAT CHARM I CAN TELL NO MAN FOR A SECRET THAT NO ONE KNOWS BUT YOU IS THE MOST POWERFUL SECRET THERE CAN EVER BE
